body_html: I don't think #ifdef-ing out every second function in a file is the best solution. It's super noisy. We should split mixed files into with-python and without-python declarations/definitions and conditionally include them
body_text: I don't think #ifdef-ing out every second function in a file is the best solution. It's super noisy. We should split mixed files into with-python and without-python declarations/definitions and conditionally include them
body: I don't think `#ifdef`-ing out every second function in a file is the best solution. It's super noisy. We should split mixed files into with-python and without-python declarations/definitions and conditionally include them
